law.catch_line: A warehouseman or his officer, agent, or employee, with the knowledge that any goods deposited with ...
law.text: A warehouseman or his officer, agent, or employee, with the knowledge that any goods deposited with or held by the warehouseman are in fact goods of which the warehouseman, solely, jointly, or in common with others, is an owner, may not issue or aid in issuing a negotiable warehouse receipt for the goods which does not state that ownership.
